00032     <h1>Internet Explorer Reflowing</h1>
00033     <p>Theoretically <acronym title="Internet Explorer">IE</acronym> should reflow boxes that have a height specified, but are too short. I'm finding though that this doesn't seem to work sometimes, so for testing this page can be loaded <?php print '<a href="' . $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'] . '">'?>with a doctype<?php print '</a>' ?> and also <a href="?nodoctype&amp;xmldecl">without</a>. <em>(Thereby changing the standards compliance.)</em></p>

00035       <p><code>DOCTYPE</code> is currently ommited.</p>

00039     <div class="body">
00040       <div class="leftcol">This column is <code>float</code>ed to the left. Its height is relatively small&hellip;</div>
00041       <div class="centercol">This is the center column. The content though is in another <code>div</code>:
00042       <div class="heightmatch"></div>
00043 
00044         <div class="content">
00045           <p>This is the actual content. The containing <code>div</code>s on this page,</p>
00046           <ul>
00047             <li><code class="body sample">.body</code></li>
00048             <li><code class="centercol sample">.centercol</code></li>
00049           </ul>
00050           <p>have a <code>height</code> of 0. In <acronym title="Internet Explorer">IE</acronym>, this should cause them to reflow around the elements that they contain. The other elements,</p>
00051           <ul>
00052             <li><code class="leftcol sample">.leftcol</code></li>
00053             <li><code class="content sample">.content</code></li>
00054             <li><code class="heightmatch sample">.heightmatch</code></li>
00055             <li><code class="rightcol sample">.rightcol</code></li>
00056           </ul>
00057           <p>have a <code>height</code> of <code>100%</code>. This should cause them to fill to the height of their containing block,</p>
00058         </div>
00059       </div>
00060       <div class="rightcol">This column is absolutely positioned and the <code>margin-right</code> of its preceding sibling, <code>centercol</code>, is such so as to allow it to be visible.</div>
